innhold.avsnitt: The father or co-mother cannot apply for parental benefit until the child has been born.An exception will be made if the mother is ill or is in hospital or another health institution. In this case, you must send a paper application by post.

You must apply at the latest within three months of the child being born to ensure that you do not lose any days of parental benefit. If you apply more than three months after the child was born, you will lose days of parental benefit.
